meanings.definition: The quality or state of being neat and stylish in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her nattiness always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The man's nattiness was evident in his well-pressed suit.
meanings.sent3: Even in casual attire, her nattiness shone through.
meanings.sent4: His nattiness was like a beacon of style in the office.
meanings.sent5: The nattiness of her outfit was the talk of the party.

meanings.definition: The act of being well-groomed and fashionable.
meanings.sent1: His nattiness was admired by all at the event.
meanings.sent2: She exuded nattiness with every step she took.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nattiness put even the most stylish humans to shame.
meanings.sent4: The nattiness of his appearance was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: In a sea of people, her nattiness was a sight to behold.
